DOC.brief_summary: The aim propose study : 1 . Examine youth parent use perceive three active living domain physical activity ( PA ) : school , recreation , transportation environment ; 2 . Identify pattern predictor environmental perception physical activity ; 3 . Compare contrast youth evaluation physical activity resource research team objective evaluation physical activity resource ; 4 . Using data , refine conceptual framework physical activity phenomena low-income minority community guide research develop item quantitative survey measure parental youth environmental perception physical activity future trial population .
DOC.detailed_description: Cognitive Interview : If agree take part study , interview discuss question ask physical activity survey . You read survey ask think read certain question well understood question . The interview record tape recorder result write . Your name use interview record . You identify number give study staff . After interview comment write , interview tape destroy . The transcript store safe locked compartment 3 year , destroy . Length Study : You study interview . THIS IS AN INVESTIGATIONAL STUDY . Up 8 child 4 parent take part study . All enrol M. D. Anderson . Physical Activity Public Housing II -- Parent : If agree take part study , take part interview member study staff housing development site . During interview , ask live public housing effect option physical activity feel neighborhood . The interview take 45 minute complete . The interview record tape recorder result write . Your name use interview record . You identify number give study staff . After interview comment write , interview tape destroy . The transcript store safe locked compartment 3 year , destroy . At time interview , also give survey question feel neighborhood , access recreational facility , physical activity , people around feel exercise , sociodemographic information ( age sex ) . The survey take 20 minute complete . Photovoice Project : You may randomly select ( flip coin ) receive letter ask participate Photovoice project . The Photovoice project activity allow express thought feeling neighborhood picture child take neighborhood . You child take picture neighborhood camera provide study staff . The picture develop study staff bring back house . You child participate interview talk photograph take . This interview take 20 minute . Length Study : If select choose take part Photovoice project , study Photovoice interview . If chose take part Photovoice project , study survey . THIS IS AN INVESTIGATIONAL STUDY . Up 36 adult parent take part individual interview . In total 36 parent 36 youth take part study total 72 participant . All enrol M. D. Anderson . Physical Activity Public Housing II -- Youth : If agree take part study , take part focus group . A focus group group people ask question certain topic discuss topic group member . During focus group , talk live public housing effect physical activity feel neighborhood . There 6 focus group , make 6 participant . The focus group session take 45 minute . The focus group session record tape recorder result write . Your name use interview record . You identify number give study staff . After interview comment write , interview tape destroy . The transcript store safe locked compartment 3 year , destroy . At time focus group session , also give survey question feel neighborhood , access recreational facility , physical activity , people around feel exercise . The survey take 15 minute complete . Photovoice Project : You may randomly select ( flip coin ) receive letter ask participate Photovoice project . The Photovoice project activity allow express thought feeling neighborhood picture parent take neighborhood . You parent take picture neighborhood camera provide study staff . The picture develop study staff bring back house . You parent participate interview talk photograph take . This interview take 20 minute . Length Study : If select choose take part Photovoice project , study Photovoice interview . If chose take part Photovoice project , study survey . THIS IS AN INVESTIGATIONAL STUDY . Up 36 youth take part focus group . In total 36 parent 36 youth take part study total 72 participant . All enrol M. D. Anderson .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Being able read speak English 2 . Selfidentify African American black 3 . Youth age 1215 year old 4 . Adults must biological parent legal guardian participate child 5 . Youth parent must live housing development least 50 % time 6 . Adults must child also participate study 7 . Children must parent legal guardian also participate study 1 ) None
